org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.converters

Class HostConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.converters.HostConverter

  • public final class HostConverter
extends Object
    A collection of utility methods to convert Host objects to their corresponding ObjectNode and vice-versa.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HostConverter.Order
      Represents all the possible ways to sort a list of host objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode hostToNode(Host host)
      Converts the given Host object into an ObjectNode.
      static Host nodeToNewHost(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode object)
      Converts the given ObjectNode into a Host object.
      static Host nodeToUpdatedHost(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode object, Host oldHost)
      Returns the given Host object updated with the values defined in the ObjectNode parameter.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • hostToNode

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode hostToNode(Host host)
        Converts the given Host object into an ObjectNode.
        Parameters:
        host - the host to convert
        Returns:
        the converted ObjectNode

      • nodeToNewHost

        public static Host nodeToNewHost(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode object)
        Converts the given ObjectNode into a Host object.
        Parameters:
        object - the ObjectNode to convert
        Returns:
        the corresponding Host object
        Throws:
        RestErrorException - if the given ObjectNode does not represent a Host object
        javax.ws.rs.InternalServerErrorException - if an unexpected error occurred

      • nodeToUpdatedHost

        public static Host nodeToUpdatedHost(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode object,
                     Host oldHost)
        Returns the given Host object updated with the values defined in the ObjectNode parameter. All fields missing in the JSON object will stay unchanged in the updated host entry.
        Parameters:
        object - the ObjectNode to convert.
        oldHost - the host entry to update.
        Returns:
        the updated host entry
        Throws:
        RestErrorException - if the given ObjectNode does not represent a Host object
        javax.ws.rs.InternalServerErrorException - if an unexpected error occurred
